entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
